021import com.destroystokyo.paper.profile.PlayerProfile;
022import net.tnemc.folia.impl.scheduler.FoliaScheduler;
023import net.tnemc.item.AbstractItemStack;
024import net.tnemc.item.paper.PaperCalculationsProvider;
025import net.tnemc.item.paper.PaperItemStack;
026import net.tnemc.paper.PaperCore;
027import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
028import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.CmdSource;
029import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.PlayerProvider;
030import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.ProxyProvider;
031import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.ServerConnector;
032import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.helper.CraftingRecipe;
033import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.scheduler.SchedulerProvider;
034import net.tnemc.plugincore.paper.hook.PAPIParser;
035import net.tnemc.plugincore.paper.impl.PaperPlayerProvider;
036import net.tnemc.plugincore.paper.impl.PaperProxyProvider;
037import org.bukkit.Bukkit;
038import org.bukkit.ChatColor;
039import org.bukkit.Material;
040import org.bukkit.NamespacedKey;
041import org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer;
042import org.bukkit.entity.Player;
043import org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack;
044import org.bukkit.inventory.ShapedRecipe;
045import org.bukkit.inventory.ShapelessRecipe;
046import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
047import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
048import revxrsal.commands.command.CommandActor;
049
050import java.io.InputStream;
051import java.util.Map;
052import java.util.Optional;
053import java.util.Set;
054import java.util.UUID;
055import java.util.stream.Collectors;
056
057/**
058 * FoliaServerProvider
059 *
060 * @author creatorfromhell
061 * @since 0.1.2.0
062 */
063public class FoliaServerProvider implements ServerConnector {
064
065  private final PaperCalculationsProvider calc = new PaperCalculationsProvider();
066  private final PaperProxyProvider proxy = new PaperProxyProvider();
067
068  private final FoliaScheduler scheduler;
069
070  protected String world = null;
071
072  public FoliaServerProvider() {
073
074    this.scheduler = new FoliaScheduler();
075  }
076
077  @Override
078  public String name() {
079
080    return "folia";
081  }
082
083  /**
084   * Used to replace placeholders from a string.
085   *
086   * @param player  The player to use for the placeholder replacement.
087   * @param message The message to replace placeholders in.
088   *
089   * @return The string after placeholders have been replaced.
090   */
091  @Override
092  public String replacePlaceholder(final UUID player, final String message) {
093
094    if(player == null) return message;
095
096    final Optional<PlayerProvider> playerOpt = PluginCore.server().findPlayer(player);
097    if(Bukkit.getPluginManager().isPluginEnabled("PlaceholderAPI") && playerOpt.isPresent()
098       && playerOpt.get() instanceof final PaperPlayerProvider paperPlayerProvider) {
099      return PAPIParser.parse(paperPlayerProvider, message);
100    }
101    return message;
102  }
103
104  /**
105   * The proxy provider to use for this implementation.
106   *
107   * @return The proxy provider to use for this implementation.
108   */
109  @Override
110  public ProxyProvider proxy() {
111
112    return proxy;
113  }
114
115  /**
116   * Used to convert an {@link CommandActor} to a {@link CmdSource}.
117   *
118   * @param actor The command actor.
119   *
120   * @return The {@link CmdSource} for this actor.
121   */
122  @Override
123  public CmdSource<?> source(@NotNull final CommandActor actor) {
124
125    return null;
126  }
127
128  @Override
129  public Set<String> onlinePlayersList() {
130    return Bukkit.getOnlinePlayers().stream()
131            .map(Player::getName)
132            .collect(Collectors.toSet());
133  }
134
135  /**
136   * Used to get the amount of online players.
137   *
138   * @return The amount of online players.
139   */
140  @Override
141  public int onlinePlayers() {
142
143    return Bukkit.getOnlinePlayers().size();
144  }
145
146  /**
147   * Attempts to find a {@link PlayerProvider player} based on an {@link UUID identifier}.
148   *
149   * @param identifier The identifier
150   *
151   * @return An Optional containing the located {@link PlayerProvider player}, or an empty Optional
152   * if no player is located.
153   */
154  @Override
155  public Optional<PlayerProvider> findPlayer(@NotNull final UUID identifier) {
156
157    return Optional.of(FoliaPlayerProvider.find(identifier.toString()));
158  }
159
160  /**
161   * This is used to return an instance of an {@link PlayerProvider player} based on the provided
162   * instance's player object.
163   *
164   * @param player The instance of the player.
165   *
166   * @return The initialized {@link PlayerProvider player object}.
167   */
168  @Override
169  public PlayerProvider initializePlayer(@NotNull final Object player) {
170
171    if(player instanceof final Player playerObj) {
172      return new FoliaPlayerProvider(playerObj);
173    }
174    return null;
175  }
176
177  /**
178   * Used to determine if this player has played on this server before.
179   *
180   * @param uuid The {@link UUID} that is associated with the player.
181   *
182   * @return True if the player has played on the server before, otherwise false.
183   */
184  @Override
185  public boolean playedBefore(final UUID uuid) {
186
187    return false;
188  }
189
190  /**
191   * Used to determine if a player with the specified username has played before.
192   *
193   * @param name The username to search for.
194   *
195   * @return True if someone with the specified username has played before, otherwise false.
196   */
197  @Override
198  public boolean playedBefore(final String name) {
199
200    return false;
201  }
202
203  /**
204   * Used to determine if a player with the specified username is online.
205   *
206   * @param name The username to search for.
207   *
208   * @return True if someone with the specified username is online.
209   */
210  @Override
211  public boolean online(final String name) {
212
213    try {
214
215      final UUID id = UUID.fromString(name);
216      return Bukkit.getPlayer(id) != null;
217    } catch(final Exception ignore) {
218      return Bukkit.getPlayer(name) != null;
219    }
220  }
221
222  @Override
223  public Optional<UUID> fromName(final String name) {
224
225    final PlayerProfile profile = Bukkit.createProfile(name);
226    final boolean complete = profile.completeFromCache();
227
228    if(complete) {
229      return Optional.ofNullable(profile.getId());
230    }
231    return Optional.empty();
232  }
233
234  /**
235   * Used to locate a username for a specific name. This could be called from either a primary or
236   * secondary thread, and should not call back to the Mojang API ever.
237   *
238   * @param id The {@link UUID} to use for the search.
239   *
240   * @return An optional containing the name if exists, otherwise false.
241   */
242  @Override
243  public Optional<String> fromID(final UUID id) {
244
245    for(final OfflinePlayer player : Bukkit.getServer().getOfflinePlayers()) {
246      if(player.getUniqueId().equals(id)) {
247        return Optional.ofNullable(player.getName());
248      }
249    }
250    return Optional.empty();
251  }
252
253  @Override
254  public String defaultWorld() {
255
256    if(world == null) {
257      world = Bukkit.getServer().getWorlds().get(0).getName();
258    }
259    return world;
260  }
261
262  /**
263   * Determines if a plugin with the correlating name is currently installed.
264   *
265   * @param name The name to use for our check.
266   *
267   * @return True if a plugin with that name exists, otherwise false.
268   */
269  @Override
270  public boolean pluginAvailable(final String name) {
271
272    return Bukkit.getPluginManager().isPluginEnabled(name);
273  }
274
275  @Override
276  public String replaceColours(final String string, final boolean strip) {
277
278    if(strip) {
279      return ChatColor.stripColor(string);
280    }
281    return ChatColor.translateAlternateColorCodes('&', string);
282  }
283
284  @Override
285  public AbstractItemStack<?> stackBuilder() {
286
287    return new PaperItemStack();
288  }
289
290  @Override
291  public void saveResource(final String path, final boolean replace) {
292
293    PaperCore.instance().getPlugin().saveResource(path, replace);
294  }
295
296  @Override
297  public @Nullable InputStream getResource(@NotNull final String s) {
298
299    return null;
300  }
301
302  /**
303   * Provides this implementation's {@link SchedulerProvider scheduler}.
304   *
305   * @return The scheduler for this implementation.
306   */
307  @Override
308  public FoliaScheduler scheduler() {
309
310    return scheduler;
311  }
312
313  /**
314   * Used to register a crafting recipe to the server.
315   *
316   * @param recipe The crafting recipe to register.
317   *
318   * @see CraftingRecipe
319   */
320  @Override
321  public void registerCrafting(@NotNull final String key, @NotNull final CraftingRecipe recipe) {
322
323    if(recipe.isShaped()) {
324      ShapedRecipe shaped;
325
326      try {
327        shaped = new ShapedRecipe(new NamespacedKey(PaperCore.instance().getPlugin(), key), (ItemStack)recipe.getResult().cacheLocale());
328      } catch(final Exception ignore) {
329        shaped = new ShapedRecipe((ItemStack)recipe.getResult().cacheLocale());
330      }
331
332      shaped.shape(recipe.getRows());
333
334      for(final Map.Entry<Character, String> ingredient : recipe.getIngredients().entrySet()) {
335        shaped.setIngredient(ingredient.getKey(), Material.valueOf(ingredient.getValue()));
336      }
337      Bukkit.getServer().addRecipe(shaped);
338    } else {
339      ShapelessRecipe shapeless;
340
341      try {
342        shapeless = new ShapelessRecipe(new NamespacedKey(PaperCore.instance().getPlugin(), key), (ItemStack)recipe.getResult().cacheLocale());
343      } catch(final Exception ignore) {
344        shapeless = new ShapelessRecipe((ItemStack)recipe.getResult().cacheLocale());
345      }
346
347      for(final Map.Entry<Character, String> ingredient : recipe.getIngredients().entrySet()) {
348        shapeless.addIngredient(1, Material.valueOf(ingredient.getValue()));
349      }
350      Bukkit.getServer().addRecipe(shapeless);
351    }
352  }
353
354  @Override
355  public PaperCalculationsProvider calculations() {
356
357    return calc;
358  }
359
360}
